text: Tihomir Ivaylo Ivanov (Bulgarian: Тихомир Ивайло Иванов; born 11 July 1994) is a Bulgarian athlete specialising in the high jump. He won a gold medal at the 2019 Summer Universiade in Naples. He has personal bests of 2.31 metres outdoors (London 2017) and 2.28 metres indoors (Banská Bystrica & Beograd 2017). ==Competition record== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2011 |European Youth Olympic Festival |Trabzon, Turkey |7th |2.00 m |- |2013 |European Junior Championships |Rieti, Italy |12th |2.10 m |- |2014 |European Championships |Zürich, Switzerland |7th |2.26 m |- |rowspan=2|2015 |European Indoor Championships |Prague, Czech Republic |14th (q) |2.24 m |- |European U23 Championships |Tallinn, Estonia |7th |2.18 m |- |rowspan=2|2016 |European Championships |Amsterdam, Netherlands |5th |2.24 m |- |Olympic Games |Rio de Janeiro, Brazil |10th |2.29 m |- |rowspan=2|2017 |European Indoor Championships |Belgrade, Serbia |4th |2.27 m |- |World Championships |London, United Kingdom |4th (q) |2.31 m1 |- |2018 |World Indoor Championships |Birmingham, United Kingdom |9th |2.20 m |- |rowspan=3|2019 |European Indoor Championships |Glasgow, United Kingdom |4th |2.22 m |- |Universiade |Naples, Italy |bgcolor=gold|1st |2.30 m |- |World Championships |Doha, Qatar |16th (q) |2.26 m |} 1No mark in the final ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male high jumpers Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Bulgaria Category:Sportspeople from Pleven Category:Universiade gold medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Universiade gold medalists for Bulgaria Category:Medalists at the 2019 Summer Universiade
title: Tihomir Ivanov
